title: Astarotte no Omocha! (Astarotte's Toy)
synopsis: Succubi, like the young princess Astarotte "Lotte" Ygvar, require the life seed from men to survive, replenish their magic, and continue the royal lineage of the magical realm. This means succubi are required to keep a harem of men close at hand. Ironically, Lotte despises men, which will put her life at risk once she matures. To convince her to fulfill her duties, one of her attendants, Judith Snorrevik, goes to the human realm to find a human male whom Lotte can tolerate.
characters: ['Ygvar, Astarotte', 'Touhara, Asuha', 'Touhara, Naoya', 'Ygvar, Mercelida', 'Sorveig Sorgrims, Ingrid', 'Mirjasdottir, Elfreda', 'Reginhard, Griselda', 'Sveinnsson Svarthaed, Sigurd', 'Snorrevik, Judith', 'Drakul Draupnils, Elika']
